113.content:
It's funny how much you can change an entire day in just a few minutes.

Today, Ruby Rose had just finished trudging through what might have been one of the longest, most stressful, and she might even go so far as to say one of the worst days she had ever attended at Beacon Academy, full of homework, tiring testing, a few less than fun run-in with less than fun monsters in the woods, and worst of all, her beloved gun-scythe Crescent Rose broke!

By the time classes were over and she was finally allowed to return to her dorm, she was fighting back the powerful urge to cry. And by the time she got to her dorm, only to find everyone, even her loving sister gone, she really did drop to her knees and cry for a good 20 minutes.

After she grabbed a few 'emergency cookies' from her bag and calmed down a little bit, she took off her usual school uniform and looked herself in the mirror as she stood in her underwear, contemplating how she could feel better about herself. Then, it hit her! She didn't know why it took so long for her to remember.

She threw off her bra and panties, and hoping nobody would show up at this time, she broke into her secret compartment in the wall up by her top bunk, and retrieved a bottle of baby powder and a thick, cushy white diaper from inside.

One powdering and padding later, Ruby lay in bed with her favorite milk and cookies, lounging in nothing but a diaper in complete and total bliss!

Now that she's found some peace in her otherwise bad day, what happened then?

1133221.content:
"What if I could have everyone from Team RWBY diapered with me?" Ruby proposed.

"An... interesting idea." Glynda muttered. "Well... You are their team leader, so you're going to have to be the one to persuade them to go along with it, but I will assist you as necessary."

"Thanks, Ms. Goodwitch." Ruby bowed her head politely.

"It's no problem at all." Ms. Goodwitch smiled. "However, I would advise you to wear something a little more... presentable." Ruby blushed as the assistant headmistress left the room, forgetting that she was naked except for her diaper.


"So, what's all this about?" Weiss asked curiously moments later as she, Blake, and Yang gathered in Team RWBY's dorm room a little while later.

"As you're no doubt aware, Ruby has had a day full of... complications today, and it's become quite noticeable that stress levels of Team RWBY as a whole have been exceptionally high as of late." Glynda opened up their meeting.

"That's why I've proposed that we have a stress-free week off, with an exercise meant to take us all out of our comfort zones a little." Ruby continued.

"Stress-free week off?" Yang repeated, grinning deviously. "Taking us out of our comfort zones? Count me in!"

"Count me out." Weiss grunted.

"Participation is mandatory for all four of you." Glynda stated.

"It seems stupid to refuse the exercise when you don't even know what it is yet." Blake muttered, looking slightly interested. "What are we going to have to do, anyways?"

"Well, for the next week..." Glynda started, gesturing to Ruby, who took a big swallow of courage, and jumped out from under her covers, revealing her half-naked diapered body.

"We're all gonna wear nothing but diapers!!" She shouted cheerily, Glynda sighing, wishing she had chosen more eloquent words, but smiled with some level of amusement regardless.

"You have GOT to be joking!" Weiss snubbed indignantly.

"Um.... okay then...." Blake said awkwardly, not sure what to think of such a thing.

"Yeeaaah...." Yang muttered, her face reddened by such a random, embarrassing thing. "I'm actually still on board with this."

"Thanks, sis." Ruby whispered, beginning to feel incredibly embarrassed about her situation.

"Very well, then." Glynda declared. "Starting today, you're all to be diapered, so get undressed, and I will assist you if necessary."

"What??! You mean... you want us in diapers NOW?!" Weiss blushed, putting her hands over her chest defensively. "What purpose does babying us even serve!?! We're supposed to be training to be huntresses, not be treated like overgrown babies!!"

"C'mons, Weiss, diapers are really relaxing!" Ruby smiled.

"And if anyone needs to take some time to chill out, who better than you, snow princess?" Yang teased, taking her clothes off.

"It's only for a single week." Blake agreed. "And who knows? It may actually be useful to us."

"Blake's right, Weiss." Glynda nodded, padding Yang's big, supple butt and moving onto Blake. "Every huntress has undergone this exercise at some point in their lives at Beacon."

"Even you?" Weiss raised an eyebrow suspiciously.

"Even me, yes." Glynda chuckled.

"You know, this isn't half bad." Blake commented. "They're actually pretty comfortable. I can see why you like them, Ruby." She smiled.

"Fine." Weiss sighed, letting her dress fall to the ground. "But only because it's apparently a necessary step to being a huntress!"

Once Weiss's padding was complete.....

"Ruby? Are you in here?" Ruby swallowed quite nervously now, sticking her head down under the covers too. "Ms. Goodwitch told me to come in here and make sure you were okay."

The white-haired girl saw Ruby's clothes scattered across the floor, panties and all, and she sighed with some exhasperation. "Honestly, Ruby, can you never pick up after yourself? I know you're not feeling good, but honestly... a proper lady never leaves her unmentionables laying around for others to see."

If there was one person that Ruby didn't want to know about her diapers, it was none other than Weiss Schnee, the snooty, prim-and-proper young mage of Team RWBY. They had been starting to get along better since their more than shaky first impressions, but even so, the idea of Wiess seeing her in nothing but a diaper was one that made Ruby feel as if she could die of embarrassment.

"Look, Ruby, I know you're in here," Weiss stated. "Please, stop hiding, and just tell me if you're okay or not, okay?" Her attention turned to the massive lump under the sheets on the top bunk. "Take off the covers, Ruby, I know you're there."

When she got no answer, Weiss tried a different tactic. "I'm going to turn around, okay?" She did so. "I'll give you all the time you need to get dressed or whatever, and let me know how you're doing."

Ruby threw off the covers, and thought about jumping down and grabbing up her clothes, but knew that Weiss would find out just by hearing the loud crinkling sound her diaper would no doubt make, so she simply looked down, exposing her half-naked body and told her white-haired friend, "I'm feeling fine right now, Weiss."

It was free-for-all day in combat class at Beacon Academy, and Ruby Rose was having a blast. Weaving through the melee, batting aside a couple of nameless mooks fellow students, she brought Crescent Rose down hard on the raised shield of Pyrrha Nikos. A flurry of blows followed, before a triumphant shout followed by a terrified scream gave Ruby just enough time to duck out of the way as Pyrrha took a ballistic Jaune to the face.

As the Invincible Girl and her teammate went down in a heap, a grinning Ruby dashed forward to engage her sister (the one responsible for launching the ballistic Jaune). Yang met her younger sibling's charge with a grin of her own, resulting in a shockwave that sent several mooks less skilled classmates sprawling. The two teammates were just getting into a rhythm when a playing dead Cardin Winchester sprang up and smashed Ruby in the crotch with his mace.

This sort of cheap shot was a favourite tactic of Cardin's on free-for-all day, and normally (against students on team RWBY's level, at least) achieved nothing more than stunning one party long enough for whoever they were facing to kick his rear across the arena and then get back to more interesting fight they were engaged in before he popped up.

Unfortunately for Ruby, this wasn't a normal day. The Dust charge in Cardin's mace was different from usual, and rather than detonating in a small burst of elemental energy, it gave off a burst of black energy that knocked Ruby to the ground, black sparks crackling across her Aura. As Ruby looked up at her sneering (and slightly surprised) attacker, several things happened at once;

"Mister Winchester!" A glow encased Cardin's raised mace, holding it in place as a furious Ms Goodwitch descended on the scene.

"Ruby!" Cardin was smashed aside by the bulldozer-like force of a berserker blonde bombshell as a furious Yang took the most direct route to her sister.

"Ahh!" Ruby screamed in pain as the dark energy sank into her body, concentrated most where the blow had connected.

Ignoring Cardin, who was currently swinging pendulum like from his suspended mace, Ms Goodwitch knelt down next to Ruby, waving the worried Yang back a bit as she held a hand above the impact site and concentrated briefly.

"As I thought. Miss Xiao Long, help your sister up and get her to the locker room immediately. I will message the nurse to meet you there." The teacher said, standing and pulling out her scroll. "Miss Rose, you need to get out of your clothes and into a shower as quickly as possible. Rinse yourself off thoroughly, especially where you were struck."

"Right away Ma'am! " Yang responded, lifting Ruby bodily and preparing to stride off before pausing, puzzled. "Um, why, exactly?"

"The Dust mix Mister Winchester used is called Weakening Dust and it is banned in competitions, and sparing matches, due to its side effects. The most serious of which is a rapid, severe and long lasting weakness of the muscles around the exposure site. We probably won't be able to Miss Rose suffering the side effects completely, but we can mitigate them if we're quick."

Nodding, Yang begins to make her way out of the arena, Ruby whimpering in pain in her arms.

The other side of the coin for that option was that she didn't have an inheritance nor a real image to uphold like she did before. And on the upside, monetary compensation plus all the diapers she could wear? She wasn't sure about that last part yet but there wasn't really much to lose.

Weiss nodded. "Yes, let's do it. I'll sign on to be a diaper model. There aren't any extra weird clauses are there?" She asked, looking at herself in her school uniform to see if her diaper was obvious. It's not too obvious I suppose....

Her manager shrugged. "Well depends on what you mean by weird. There's a clause that says you are to be 'testing' the product at all times; as in you'll be wearing diapers full time from now on. Don't worry, we'll have you a customer diaper bag ready in about half an hour. Other than that, there's not much else besides hours, compensation, how to terminate a contract, etc. Though if you're interested, we wouldn't mind you having a friend join you in being a model or if you know someone else who might be interested. And we're also looking for others around your age to play the role of 'mommy' for you in the photo shoots."

Weiss couldn't say these were bad terms. After about fifteen minutes of discussion, Weiss had formally signed on to be the company's first diapered model.



Would you like to explore Weiss' new life wearing diapers? Would you like to have a friend join her in wearing diapers? Would you like to have a friend join as her mommy figure?

124111211.content:
Weiss made her way back to the dorm room, where a company attendant had already delivered several packs of diapers discreetly for Weiss. Right now, she knew Yang would be at the gym, Blake would be at the library until dinner, but Ruby...she didn't know. Ruby did something different every day and sometimes it was hard to pin her down. She hoped she could have at least five minutes to think of how to explain this to her team before running into any of them.

She made her way upstairs, the halls alive with light chatter as students peppered the small community rooms on each floor. Even still, there weren't a lot of students to accidentally bump into. Weiss kept her cool, keeping up the air of confidence she usually carried around her as she made her way to her dorm room. She slipped inside after peering around the door to see if anyone was inside. Thankfully, no one was. The new baby made her way over to her bed and plopped down on her padded bottom, diaper just ever so slightly visible underneath her skirt.

Ruby came out of the bathroom moments later, completely naked. "Oh hey Weiss, what's up?" She asked, looking over and seeing her partner on the bed. Something was...slightly different. She couldn't tell yet.

Weiss shot up on the bed, keeping most of her composure. "Holy crap Ruby, you scared me..."

Ruby chuckled softly. "Heh...sorry. Whatcha up to though? I thought you would be at your job thing till dinner."

Weiss cleared her throat pretending to have composure. "W-well I finished what was needed of me so they sent me home since they didn't need anything else." Nailed it!

Ruby shrugged. "Well whatever it is, some dudes who said they worked for your boss dropped off a bunch of diapers. Mind if I grab one? I haven't worn them in like...two years!"

Weiss froze for a moment, but the question perplexed her. "I'm sorry, you want a diaper? I mean help yourself I guess..."

Ruby dashed over and was diapered in mere moments. She grabbed a t-shirt and sighed. "Oh yeah this feels good..."

Weiss decided to take off her uniform, revealing her diaper. "I-I'm a diaper model now Ruby. That's my job. I model diapers and baby clothes. I'll be wearing diapers from now on and I can get as many diapers as you want as part of my pay."

Ruby cheered. "Yes!" She looked over and saw Weiss just in her white bra and diaper. "Wow Weiss, you're really pretty." She blurted out, blushing a bit.

Weiss blushed as she dropped her bra. "Th-thank you...Even with the diaper?"

Ruby nodded. "Y-yeah especially with the diaper. You wanna...mess around or nap or something?"
124111211.title: Ruby

124111213.content:
Weiss made her way back to the dorm room, where a company attendant had already delivered several packs of diapers discreetly for Weiss. Right now, she knew Ruby would be at her dueling class with Pyrrha, Blake would be at the library until dinner, but Yang...she didn't know. She hoped she could have at least five minutes to think of how to explain this to her team.

She made her way upstairs, the halls alive with light chatter as students peppered the small community rooms on each floor. Even still, there weren't a lot of students to accidentally bump into. Weiss kept her cool, keeping up the air of confidence she usually carried around her as she made her way to her dorm room. She slipped inside after peering around the door to see if anyone was inside. Thankfully, no one was. The new baby made her way over to her bed and plopped down on her padded bottom, diaper just ever so slightly visible underneath her skirt.

Her peace and quiet was interrupted by a certain blonde-haired girl bursting into the room. "Hey Weiss! You got a delivery!" She came in, honestly not expecting anyone to be in the room. "Oh hey Weiss you're actually here. Some dudes dropped off a bunch of packages of diapers with your name on them. What's up with that?"

Weiss had jolted up into the air, the fright causing her bladder to empty into her diaper. She landed back on her bed, blushing a deep red. "W-well...I put myself out on the market for modeling as I'd had a few requests since apparently my size and figure is quite desirable so I've been told. I did a few one-off jobs, then was hired...to wear diapers and baby clothes. Pay was three times the best pay I've received from other shoots. Plus, their brand of diaper was softer than any panties I've ever worn. I signed on to wear diapers and be their model."

Yang was definitely the one on the team to have the most open mind. "That's cute Weiss~" She teased, helping Weiss up. "I'll change your diaper in a minute. I'm used to changing Ruby's. Would you believe she didn't stop wetting the bed until she went to Signal?" Yang walked over to where the diapers were and opened up a pack and grabbed the supplies needed for a diaper change. She also grabbed the one odd pack of diapers that looked slightly different.

Weiss giggled a bit at hearing Ruby still wet the bed until she was almost 14 years old. She didn't put up much of a fight with the diaper change, as Yang was MUCH stronger than her. Soon enough, the ex-heiress was secured into a fresh diaper.

Yang picked up the other pack of diapers that looked slightly different. "Hey Weiss, any reason why you got a pack of M/L diapers when yours said Small?" Yang ripped the pack open and pulled out a diaper.

"Uh maybe a mix up? Though...if you want to, you can wear diapers with me and join the agency. You'll get a lot of money and I'm pretty sure you won't have to wear all the time like me." She replied, turning around to see Yang already taping the diaper up snuggly.

"Huh? Yeah sure if I get paid, why not? I always wondered what these felt like. Soft aren't they?" Yang was diapered and seemingly enjoyed them. "You wanna take a nap Princess? They left you a onesie to wear and other baby things~ I'll even let you sleep on my boobs."

What does Weiss decide to do?

- Wear the onesie and have a pacifier popped into her mouth to nap on Yang.
- Don't wear the onesie, pacifier optional
- Something else

12431.content:
When Weiss finally came to, she was in the beacon hospital, wearing a gown and bedsheets pulled up to her chest. Her body ached all over, and she felt in tremendous pain. It took her a minute to get hold of her surroundings, and eventually a doctor arrived.

"Miss Schnee! It's so good to see you're awake. Now don't worry, you're in safe hands." The doctor was a quite short woman, maybe in her late thirties with dark red hair in a bob, and golden eyes. Weiss stumbled to sit up, with help from the doctor.

"What...where am I...what happened?" Weiss asked, dazed and confused about the whole ordeal. "I remember fighting... there was an Ursa... I don't remember..." Weiss rubbed her head.

"Don't worry, it's completely natural to feel confused given your state." The doctor explained. Weiss looked at her.

"My state?" She asked. The doctor looked a bit uncomfortable, but smiled comfortingly.

"You've been in a coma for three weeks. We had to put you under after the surgery got complicated. Don't worry - you'll make a full recovery. There was some serious damage to your lower abdomen, and major organ damage, as well as trauma to your digestive system. They'll be some scarring from the operation, but it will be barely visible after a month or so. You'll get better soon enough."

Weiss looked bewildered. She couldn't believe what she was hearing. Three weeks had been lost. She looked under her sheets, and saw that her belly was wrapped in bandages. She suddenly felt very emotional, as her eyes welled up with tears, and she began to cry. The doctor looked at her with sympathy.

At that moment, Weiss noticed a trickling sound next to her bed. She looked, and saw a plastic bag filling up with urine. The only problem was that she didn't even know that she was going. She looked at the doctor, as if asking for answers.

"One more thing..." The doctor added. "Because of the damage to your internal organs... it appears that you'll suffer from both urinary and fecal incontinence for the rest of your life." Weiss cried when she heard this, and the doctor called for someone, before leaving.

Just then, Weiss's older sister, Winter, appeared at the foot of her bed. She looked worried, but was overjoyed to see Weiss awake.

"Weiss! I came as soon as I heard what happened. How do you feel? Are you OK?" Weiss nodded to her sister.

"Is it true? I'm... I can't..." She couldn't get the words out, but winter knew what she was trying to say.

"Yes, I'm afraid. You're incontinent. But don't worry - I'm going to look after you. Not to mention that you're friends have said they're more than willing to help." Weiss smiled, and hugged her sister.

"Thank you winter."

Weiss was discharged, and winter took her to team RWBY's dorm room. Her teammates already knew the situation, and all agreed to help winter to support Weiss.

What happens next?
12431.title: Winter comes to help take care of Weiss during ...

124311.content:
Weiss yawned, rubbing her eyes. She looked at the clock and saw that it was half three in the afternoon.

"Guys, I'm kind of tired. I think I'll get some rest. Wake me up in time for dinner." She stated, as she dressed herself in her pyjamas and slipped into bed.

"OK Weiss. We were planning to head out, but winter will take care of you. Right" Yang stated, asking winter.

"Of course." Winter replied. She said goodbye to the girls, before shutting the door and taking a seat by Weiss's desk. She looked at her sister and saw that she was already fast asleep.

When she was sure Weiss was asleep, winter received a message on her scroll, informing her that the leave she had requested to look after Weiss had been granted. She smiled to herself, before searching the Internet for stores in Vale that sell diapers that would fit Weiss. She was disappointed to find that the only adult diapers avaliable would be from an ABDL store, which would be obvious to spot, especially if she filled them, or else she would have to get some children's diapers with childish patterns on them. She decided which would be best and ordered them, before deciding to read through the medical notes that the doctor had given her.

As she slept, Weiss found that she had terrible nightmares of herself being attacked by an Ursa, which quickly turned into her being told of her incontinence. Before long, her nightmares depicted her friends, teachers, even her sister all laughing at her. She looked down and saw that she'd had a "messy" accident. She desperately tried to escape, but couldn't. She then saw herself as a baby. She was wearing a diaper and a pacifier, which turned into herself at her current age, naked except her diaper, with a pacifier, crying in a messed diaper.

Weiss woke with a start. Just a bad dream. She sighed, relieved, but found herself covered in a cold sweat.

"Weiss get up!" Winter instructed. Weiss turned over to look at her sister. As she did so, she felt something squish against her bottom, and a strange dampness in her pyjamas. She didn't even have to look to know what had happened.

"Weiss, you... had a little accident." Winter stated, blushing slightly. Weiss started to cry again, feeling humiliated by not only wetting the bed, but messing it too. Winter hugged her sister to confirm her.

"It's OK Weiss. I'm going to make this better for you. Trust me." Before Weiss could ask how this could possibly be made better, winter showed her...

At first it was a sniffle, then a sneeze. Then the stomach pain started. Weiss was getting sicker and sicker and she just felt miserable. Nothing was helping but she couldn’t abandon her studies so she kept pushing her body more than it could.

This culminated into this morning. Weiss woke up feeling awful as usual. But then she went to sat up. And something smeared in her underwear. She got up and went to the bathroom where she confirmed it. She had somehow been able to shit the bed. She suddenly heard a splashing sound and looked down to see she was pissing herself. She didn’t even know she had to go! In a panic she jumped into the shower and stood there until she knew it was over.

She threw on some clothes, with a pad in place to make sure there were no accidents, and went down to the infirmary. According to the tests they ran she had a rare form of Grimm flu. It culminated in targeting a random muscle group to paralyze. Weiss had lost complete control of her bladder and bowels. They assured her that the other symptoms would clear up soon but unfortunately the muscle damage was permanent. They gave her a few diapers to hold her over until they could order a supply for her and she left.

She didn’t know what to do. She didn’t want to tell her team but she knew it was going to be hard to hide.

12433231123.content:
Weiss waited in the dorm room for her teammates to return. She had..."organized" a small contest for her team. She wanted to wear diapers and be dressed and treated like a baby, but no be so obvious about it. Once her teammates got back, they would know the rules. Three rounds of voting, each round someone gets put into diapers, and if voted upon in further rounds will be progressively more babied.

Her teammates didn't take long to come back in and Weiss explained the rules. Pyrrha would be acting as an impartial judge and vote counter in the other room, and they would message their votes to her. She'd come over and announce who was voted upon the most, and proceed to diaper or baby that person more until all three rounds were complete. Her teammates figured this was just for the weekend so they'd humor the "princess".

The first round of votes were cast. Weiss voted for herself, Ruby voted for Yang (who wouldn't want to be the older sister for a bit?), and Blake and Yang both voted for Weiss.

Pyrrha showed up a minute later. "Well the votes are in, three for Weiss. Weiss, to the bed sweetie. You've lost your panties." Weiss blushed of course to keep up the act. She laid down and was quickly put into a thick, white diaper. There were more colors to come if she wanted them though.

Weiss sat back down on the floor, diaper covered for the time being. They teased Weiss for a minute.

Ruby giggled. "I'ma have fun changing your diapers Weiss! I never got to babysit when I was younger So I'm looking forward to it."

Blake couldn't help but smile. "I think it's fitting for the princess to also be a baby."

Yang poked the most fun at Weiss."Yeah, I bet she can't wait for us to vote her all the way down." Yang didn't mean it, expecting Ruby to probably end up in diapers as well.

Second round of votes were cast. Weiss, Ruby, and Yang all cast votes for Weiss, and Blake voted for Yang. Seeing the diaper on Weiss made her feel like it'd look good on Yang's ass.

Pyrrha again popped over a minute later. "Well another three votes for Weiss." She said, scooping Weiss up and popping a pacifier in her mouth and removing her skirt.

The room was a bit more quiet this time, with Blake thinking to herself that Weiss had to have voted for herself. Ruby was starting to get the same idea.

The last round of votes were cast. Every member voted for Weiss. Pyrrha appeared after the requisite minute smiling. "Well, I think we know who's won this round. With four votes, Weiss will now be the team baby." She announced, holding up a cute light blue onesie for Weiss.

Ruby didn't pay attention to the number of votes but happily hopped up and pushed Weiss into the bathroom to change her into the onesie. Blake and Yang had put it together themselves and were chuckling. "Ya know, if she wanted to be a baby, all she had to do was ask." Yang mused to Blake.

Blake couldn't help but giggle. "Well she tried to be fair I suppose."

Ruby led Weiss out of the bathroom, now dressed in the onesie and a short skirt that did effectively nothing to hide her diaper. "I present to you Weiss! The princess that wanted to be a baby!"

Weiss was horribly embarrassed, but in the good way. Her face was red, but she was smiling.

Ruby was excited. "So whatcha wanna do first Weiss? Wanna take a nap with one of us? Have a nice bottle of milk? Or...do you want one of us to play with you?"

The day started like any other. Classes, lunch, classes, dinner, free time, and bed. The usual schedule. Weiss had grown accustomed to the routine. However, this was the week before a week-long break. And as such, many students were making plans for what they were going to do. Some who lived nearby were heading home, even a few who were from other continents planned the same. Weiss...planned on not heading home as Atlas was far away and she would prefer to not have to deal with her father. She had to figure out what to do on her own for a week.

Her silent moment of thinking was interrupted by a familiar voice fading in from the distance. "Weeeeeiiiiiiiissssssssssssssssssss!!!" Ruby yelled, quickly running towards her and then picking her up in a hug. "Weiss I've been looking for you! I thought you'd be back at the dorm room by now but I'm glad I found you."

Weiss sighed and returned the hug. She wasn't annoyed by Ruby, and in fact had grown quite fond of her over the past month almost to the point of a crush. "I-I was having a moment of quiet. I was trying to figure out what I wanted to do with a week by myself." She responded, having been leaning against a tree in the courtyard.

Ruby couldn't help but giggle. "Weiss, I'm not going anywhere on break. I'll be here. In fact...I've got something planned, c'mon!" The energetic girl grabbed her friend with the enthusiasm of a puppy and dragged her up to their dorm room. "Blake and Yang are out in town tonight on a volunteer project so it's just you and me." Yang opened her eyes.

The last thing she remembered was being at school. She was walking to class when she heard a noise. She went to investigate, then... nothing. She must have been drugged or knocked out, because the next thing she knew, she woke up here.

Where? She didn't know. She couldn't see, but she could feel a blindfold over her eyes. She seemed to be wearing some sort of headphones, but nothing was playing. She could also feel her hands tied behind her back, and something rubber tied in her mouth so she could spit it out. She didn't know what she was wearing, but it felt like some sort of dress, and she wasn't wearing a bra or panties, but there was something bulky and soft around her waist.

Yang squirmed to free her hands, but being unable to see limited her ability to formulate an escape plan. She felt extremly vulnerable, and knew that she had to get out of here soon.

Suddenly, she heard what sounded like a door opening, and a lightswitch turn on. She quickly pretended to still be unconscious, as she heard heels approaching her. A woman. She feels the woman reach a small hand down and feel the padding covering her crotch.

"Still dry." The woman remarked. Her voice wasn't known, but yang could feel something familiar about the woman. She sounded sweet, but somewhat sinister. She removed yangs blindfold.

"I knew you were awake. I could hear you squirming." The woman stated. Yang looked up at her to see the pink and brown haired girl who had been working with Torchwick. However, her initial anger subsided when Yang looked down in horror at what she was wearing.

She appeared to have a baby pacifier in her mouth, and was wearing a pink dress, which wasn't long enough to cover the diaper that was fastened around her waist.

"Anyway, I needed to make sure you wouldn't escape, so I planted hypnotic triggers in you mind while you slept. Let me show you!" She exclaimed. "Yang, mommy says 'poop'."

15533222222222222122212211.content:
Ruby was on the way back to her dorm room after a long day. She was looking for some spare parts, she could use to improve crescent rose, but up to now she didn't find anything she could afford and it was starting to get dark outside. It was then that she saw one shop that peeked her interest.

Her teammates surely wouldn't mind if she would take a quick look, would they? Ok maybe Weiss would lecture her again for being so irresponsable but improving crescent rose would be worth it. Entering the shop, she gave a quick "yo" to the shopkeep and looked through the items. There were many dust crystals, weapons and various metals. But one thing made the young huntress in training stop in her tracks.

In front of Ruby was something she never saw before. Inside a glass vitrine was a rainbow dust crystal. "Woah.":Ruby said in awe. "Does this old thing interest you?":the shopkeep had appeared behind her. Ruby nodded:"It looks pretty cool. Can I hold it in my hands? " The shopkeep put his hand on his chin, thinking, before he said:"You'd be the first person to do this."

Ruby looked at him, not understanding what he meant by that:"huh." The shopkeep gave a nervous laugh at that:"Well you see, legend says that dust crystal is...umm...well.. cursed. Something will happen to whoever touches it." Ruby looked back at the crystal:" That sounds just like those ghost stories my sister used to tell me when I was little. How do you know it is cursed?"

"The previous owner told me so. It was an old woman. Don't know why she was willing to give me that thing for almost nothing. But well, seeing as I still didn't sell it... Anyway, you still want to touch it?":the shopkeep asked. Ruby nodded. She didn't believe in such things as curses. And so the shopkeep opened the vitrine:"Here you go." Ruby slowly put her hand into the vitrine and touched the crystal, only to immediately retrieve her hand because she got an electrical shock:"Ow."

"What happened?":the shopkeep asked. "Something shocked me. Did you charge that thing with electricity or something?":Ruby asked. "No. Can't remember that I did something like that.":the shopkeep replied. Little did Ruby know that that little electric shock was the first sign of the curse. Ruby looked at her scroll to see what time it was. Noticing that it was already way past the time she wanted to spend at this shop, she rushed to the door:"Sorry I have to go. I'll come back tomorrow, ok? " She didn't even wait for his answer and left the shop. She shouldn't have wasted her time here, Weiss will be so mad.

--30 minutes later--

"Where have you been? Aren't your grades worth anything to you? I learned the whole day for the upcoming test tomorrow. Well... I tried to. Thanks to Yang, we had to search for you in the whole building.":Weiss said, her anger about this situation clearly visible. "S-Sorry I was looking for a cool upgrade for crescent rose. There was this awesome dust crys...":Ruby was cut short.

"I don't want to hear your excuses. We all agreed that we are back in our dorm room when it gets dark. Why can't you act like a responsable leader?":Weiss asked. There it was again, the old "be a responsable leader" that Weiss always used when Ruby was doing something that wasn't up to Weiss's standards of a good leader. Usually followed by an "I could have done that better." In these moments Ruby just didn't listen anymore. She heard Weiss's speech about being responsable almost a million times by now.

But not listening to her proved to be a mistake as Weiss took notice of that:"Ruby? Are you even listening? " She touched her leader, only to get an electrical shock. "Ow":the Schnee heiress immediately put her hands away from Ruby in shock. Ruby, not noticing what had just happened began to worry for her friend:"What happened? Are you ok? " Weiss looked at her as if Ruby was playing fool:"You just shocked me. "

"Oh I'm sorry. I didn't want to. Maybe I was still a bit electrically charged from that dust crystal.":Ruby said. "Why were playing around with yellow dust?":Weiss asked. "Yellow dust? No it was a rainbow dust crystal that I touched. ":Ruby said. Weiss just shook her head:"Don't make me laugh Ruby. There is no such thing as rainbow dust. You can't fool me with this obvious lie. If there is one person to know everything known to man about dust, it's me. So don't tell me stories about something that obviously isn't real. "

"Could you please be quiet. I'm trying to sleep.":Yang said, as she looked at the two girls from her bed. Weiss gave Ruby a glare :"If this little trip of yours is going to ruin my grades, I swear I will... " But Yang interrupted her:"I said I wanted to sleep." Weiss just gave one look that said everything to Ruby and then went to her bed. Why did she always have to be so grumpy?

Ruby saw no point in staying up any longer. She was already quite tired from her trip to the city and there was nothing else she could do now then sleep. And so the young huntress dressed herself in her pajamas and climbed up to her bed. Closing her eyes, she began to dream about going back to this shop to show Weiss the crystal. Little did she know that both her and Weiss would have an unpleasent surprise tomorrow when they would wake up.

A cold breeze went over Ruby's body as she awoke. Rubbing her eyes, she wondered why her bed was so cold and wet as if someone had left the window open. A distinct scent entered her nose. A scent she she hadn't smelled for years. Her eyes shot open as she realized what it was. But no that couldn't be. She was way to old for that to happen. And she didn't even drink before going to bed.

But here she was, sitting in her damp sheets. Of course Ruby didn't want Yang to see that her little sister had an accident again. She would only use that to make fun of her again and Ruby really didn't have the nerves for that right now. Pushing her blanket off of herself, she inspected the damage. A large wet spot was clearly visible on the front of her pajama pants and it was spread even further under her bottom.

Luckily her teammates weren't awake yet. Looking down to Weiss's bed to see if some of her pee made it's way down into it, Ruby noticed that the Schnee heiress wasn't laying in her bed. Where was she? And why were both her bed sheets and her blanket missing? No. Ruby didn't pee this much, did she? Please don't. She would never forget such an embarrassing moment. But what other explanation was there? Weiss peeing her bed?... Yeah right. She would never do that.

But Ruby had to hurry now. Who knows when Blake and Yang would wake up? They would surely smell what she did. And Ruby wasn't looking forward to that. Grabbing all the wet stuff, Ruby went over to the bathroom. Going in, she was immediately greeted by a scream and a half naked Weiss, who was covering her body. In front of her were also damp bed sheets and clothes.

Mistaking it as her own fault, Ruby quickly apologized:"I'm sorry that I peed so much. I didn't want to wet the bed and I certainly didn't want to wet yours too. " What Weiss answered was something Ruby thought she would never hear come out of Weiss's mouth:"Wait... You wet the bed too?" Ruby was a bit baffled at this. Did Weiss just admit that she wet the bed? "I...umm...yes. I guess so. ":Ruby stuttered.

"That's... certainly a coincidence. Anyway let me help you put this stuff away. And your pajama pants and panties can also go in the washing machine. Don't worry I won't look.":Weiss said. Ruby was always surprised how quick Weiss could change from her strict attitude to her more caring and understanding one. The little accident she had wasn't that big of a deal now that she knew that Weiss had experienced the same.

Oh the thought alone was too good to be true. Yes, she should definitely do that. "Guards, I demand to be changed...":said Sienna.

The guards began to look at each other, trying to decide who should do it. Sienna could imagine what they were thinking right now. "Please not me." or "I'm too young to do this." It's a shame she was sparing them this time. "I demand to be changed by a human.":Sienna said. She could hear one of them exhale loudly but decided to not punish him this time. But she would surely remember that. "What are you waiting for? Go to the dungeons and find someone who changes me. Or would you be interested in doing it yourself?"

She didn't have to repeat that another time as the guards immediately ran into the dungeons to get her a human. As the same back they brought...

1553322222222222222222111123.content:
Sienna was fuming as she saw her guards return empty handed. "How hard can it be to get me a human? Once again you proved to be inefficient at following my orders and you know what that means.":Sienna said. "But...your highness how are we supposed to get you a human if we simply don't have any in the dungeons?":One of the guards asked. "Silence. I don't want to hear your poor excuse of an apology. If you can't follow even the simplest of orders, you will have to pay for it. How can you call yourselves my guards if you can't fulfill my wishes?":Sienna said, trying to hide her smile.

"We apologize your highness.":The guards said in unison. "Again! I don't want to hear you apologize for it. I want to see you suffer for it. A true guard is willing to do everything for his leader. A true guard takes the blame for his actions. Show me that I can depend on you. Tell me...which one of you is responsible for this? Step up and face your punishment. Otherwise all of you will have to suffer.":Sienna said.

Sienna looked at their faces. They displayed fear. They expected that she would punish all of them, but now one of them had to take the blame for their failure to save them from her. And of course no one was willing to do it. "I'm waiting.":Sienna said. She knew what was going through their heads. They didn't want to do it. They looked at one another, considering who they cared about the least. Betraying their comrades to save themselves, Sienna was really liking what she saw. It proved that they really were fearing her.

"I'm counting down now. 3...2...":Sienna began. She saw how they started to panic. They had to do something. They didn't want to end like that guy they transported out of here earlier. As their eyes finally focused on one of their comrades, They didn't waste time pushing him towards Sienna as he began to scream:"Please don't. I still have so much I want to do. I don't want it to end here. Please." But the other guards didn't listen as he began to fall down in front of Sienna's throne.

Looking down on him, Sienna smiled:"Now look at this guard. He took the blame all on himself, while all of you are to weak to stand up for your mistakes. This is what I call a real guard." To have him here at her feet, knowing that he was just as innocent as the others, Sienna didn't want to admit it nur she was feeling something. A great feeling. A feeling that she was not allowed to show at the moment. She was going to enjoy the hell out of punishing him. But what should she do this time? She already sat on the face of that other guard.

She needed something else to punish him with. Maybe she could push his face against her crotch, let him get a good whiff of the pee-soaked front of her diaper. Or what might even be more cruel, have his face being inside her diaper while she was wearing it and tape it shut around him. The thought alone...uhh...It was brilliant, and not only that. Her guards would fear her even more after doing so. So it was settled then Sienna was going to...

But just then she could feel something wet on her toes. "Please I beg you, spare me.":The guard said as he kissed her feet. Sienna gave him a disgusted look and kicked him in the face:"Even now you can't go through with what you started but you know how merciful I am. I promise to make it quick. And next time (I know there won't be one) take in consideration how your comrades should remember you, because now you ruined your image of the brave guard who sacrificed himself and became nothing more than a crying wreck that needs to be ended. But I'll be happy to take care of that."

15533222222222222222221111231.content:
The guard gave her a fearful look after she told him that she would end him. "No please, you got to understand...":he began, but Sienna simply grabbed him by his chin and looked into his eyes. "It doesn't matter what you are going to say. I don't want to hear it. It was you who decided to stand up for your comrades. So act like it.":she said and without a warning she pushed his face against her diapered crotch, feeling a strong feeling of pleasure as she did so, but she hid it well.

Holding his head in place with her hand she made sure he got a good whiff of what she had done in her diaper. All the guard was able to see was the pee soaked front of her diaper, while he tried his best to escape her grasp. Sienna then began to use her legs to prevent him from doing so. The guard panicked as his oxygen began to decline. Screaming and kicking around he tried his best at getting out of his current position. But to no avail. Sienna didn't even seem to notice him anymore. She wasn't one bit and had no problem with holding him in place.

As if that wasn't enough, she also began to pee her diaper another time, as he could feel the trickling through the fabric. And while Sienna thought that there couldn't have been a better timing for that than now, the guard slowly began to lose conciousness. As the trickling stopped, he too stopped moving. To finish it, Sienna gave a sigh of relieve before releasing him from her grip, letting him fall to the ground, lifeless.

Looking at his body, a disgusted expression on her face she ordered:"Get this trash out of these halls. And change me already." The guards picked up the body and carried it outside before coming back again. Not one of them showing any sign of regret on their faces for sacrificing their own comrade. Just what Sienna wanted to see. They feared her so much that they did anything to please her."Since there are no humans in the dungeons how about you go in the hunt for some or maybe change me yourself. I leave it up to you. But I warn you, if I have to sit in this diaper for...let's say two more hours, all of you will end up as seat cushions for my throne.":Sienna said.
